title: "Jimmy Fallon" typeface
content:
Anyone have a clue what typeface "Jimmy Fallon" is set in?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825183819im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BCOhEtqCMAEX4V-_3770.jpg)
author: chrisburton

comments.content:
It must be **[Miller Display (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825183819/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/miller/)** by Font Bureau, 1997 (Carter & Cone Type Inc, 1994)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825183819/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
